mapper.sql: id, user_id, title, type, description, imgs, location, address,is_used, no_used, create_time, update_time, ext1, ext2
mapper.insert: insert into message (id, user_id, title, type, description, imgs, location, address, create_time, update_time, ext1, ext2) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into message
id,
user_id,
title,
type,
description,
imgs,
location,
address,
create_time,
update_time,
ext1,
ext2,

mapper.update:
update message
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imgs = #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no_used = #{noUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update message set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgs = #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from message where 1=1
and type = (type & #{interest,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and address like CONCAT('%',#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by create_time desc limit #{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}
